Three more men charged
in marathon bombing case

All suspects waive their right to bail hearing

Azamat Tazhayakov and Dias Kadyrbayev, both 19 and of New Bedford, were charged with conspiracy to obstruct justice. Robel Phillipos, 19, of Cambridge was charged with making false statements. (4:08 p.m.)

Injured MBTA officer thanks community

Richard Donohue, who was injured in a shootout with the alleged bombers, thanked police and first responders. (1:57 p.m.)

Economy

Unemployment rates fall in most cities

Unemployment rates fell in nearly 90 percent of large US cities in March — but that may be because more people stopped looking for work. (3:45 p.m.)

News

New dinosaur species discovered

A telltale jaw fragment unearthed from a 75 million-year-old rock formation in Big Bend, Texas, has led to the identification of a new dinosaur species, Leptorhynchos gaddisi.
